item.title: Fifty million years of beetle evolution along the Antarctic Polar Front
Fifty million years of beetle evolution along the Antarctic Polar Front

• Fifty million years of beetle evolution along the Antarctic Polar Front.H Baird, S Shin, R Oberprieler, M Hullé, P Vernon, K Moon, Adams, R.H., D McKenna, S Chown. Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences PNAS Commentary VIDEO
